web.title: Web Solutions
web.description: I can help you build and maintain websites and applications. I have experience with design, implementation, and deployment of custom web solutions.

design.title: Design
design.description: UI/UX design, logo design, and branding are no strangers to me. I try to empathize with the ordinary user and anticipate what they would like best.

brainstorming.title: Brainstorming
brainstorming.description: I appreciate your feedback during our collaboration. I will help direct the solution in the right direction and avoid mistakes.

jobs.details: A mobile travel app that uses AI to create a customized itinerary based on the user's requirements.
Backend development focus. Design and implementation of new features in the Smart4City system.

aboutMe.title: A little bit about me...
aboutMe.description: Improving myself and keeping up with trends is one of the most important parts of modern application development for me. Over time, I have become more inclined towards a product overview than coding itself. For me, that is now a smaller part of creating an application, especially with today's AI development. It is important to know the context, be able to make effective decisions, and accept the risks of possible choices. However, the desire to write a few lines of code will probably never leave me... :D
